body_html:
I would actually recommend other samplers like subset random sampler also not be defined in the __iter__() function itself, as that prevents it from being used for dynamic sampling/importance sampling

(Sample implementations from this year's ICML)

I would actually recommend other samplers like subset random sampler also not be defined in the __iter__() function itself, as that prevents it from being used for dynamic sampling/importance sampling
(Sample implementations from this year's ICML)
body:
I would actually recommend other samplers like subset random sampler also not be defined in the `__iter__()` function itself, as that prevents it from being used for dynamic sampling/importance sampling

([Sample implementations from this year's ICML](https://github.com/idiap/importance-sampling))
